description: Details pursuant to conditions 4 (landscape), 8 (energy assessment), 9 (air quality), 10 (delivery drop-off, car parking, fire safety strategy, and accessibility), 12 (accessibility), and 16 (parking allocation scheme) of planning application reference 72470/APP/2023/747, dated 15.04.2024 for 'An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to vary Condition 2 (Approved Drawings) and 3 (General Compliance with Supporting Documentation) of planning permission reference 72470/APP/2016/4648, dated 02-10-2019, for the demolition of 3 dwellinghouses and redevelopment of the site to provide residential accommodation within 2 new buildings with associated access, parking, landscaping and amenity space. The amendment sought is to increase the number of dwellings by two, amendments to the vehicle and cycle parking provision.'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to demonstrate that acceptable landscaping, air quality mitigation, and parking allocation scheme would be implemented on the site in accordance with the requirements of condition 4, condition 9, and condition 16 and policies within the NPPF, The London Plan, Hillingdon Local Plan Part 1, and Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2.
